item.title: Fonts fonts fonts ..and fonts. On VoidLinux while using DWM window manager and a desire to use that fancy icons, emoji, glyphs
item.description: So what’s the plan To use and see symbols, icons, glyphs like ó°‹Š or this ï‹› or this ðŸ“¶ specific fonts have to be installed. What should be a trivial task from first view sometimes can be very tramedous task and time consuming job. Basic install of VoidLinux does not iclude much of fonts for fancy symbols display. While installing X server /Xorg/ it is recommended to install x fonts metapackage
